# WorkDirectoryGen

WorkDirGen is a utility to generate a folder structure from various input formats such as text, image, PDF, or JSON.

## Project Structure
``` 
WorkDirectoryGen/
│
├── WorkDirectoryGen/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── core.py
│   └── cli.py
│
├── setup.py
├── requirements.txt
└── README.md
```

## Installation

```bash
    pip install .
```
